\documentclass[a4paper]{article}

% Nicer font than default one. Since we're only presenting this digitally, sans-serif.
\usepackage{libertine}
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\sfdefault}
\usepackage{biblatex}
\addbibresource{references.bib}
\begin{document}
% paper.tex for now is automatically generated. We might change this later
\input{paper.tex}
\printbibliography
\end{document}
